DOC.brief_summary: In diabetic patients with end-stage renal disease to investigate the prevalence of diabetic complications and quality of life and to compare with non-diabetic patients with ESRD and diabetic patients with normal kidney function.
DOC.brief_title: Diabetic Patients With End-Stage Renal Disease
DOC.criteria: Presence of diabetes and treatment with either dialysis or renal transplantation Age < 18 Pregnancy
